updates.title: Add dynamic difficulty balancing and room allocation for public multiplayer sessions
updates.content:
Add dynamic difficulty balancing and room allocation for public multiplayer sessions

Commit: 01fe1f4

- Introduced dynamic minimum room allocation per difficulty level (`PUBLIC_ROOM_MIN_PER_DIFFICULTY`).

updates.title: Add session cleanup sweeps and improve timeout handling
updates.content:
Add session cleanup sweeps and improve timeout handling

Commit: 8a491f9

- Introduced `MULTIPLAYER_CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MS` to configure periodic session cleanup intervals.

updates.title: Add session cleanup sweeps and improve timeout handling
updates.content:
Add session cleanup sweeps and improve timeout handling

Commit: 38fb698

- Introduced `MULTIPLAYER_CLEANUP_INTERVAL_MS` to configure periodic session cleanup intervals.

updates.title: Add "Join Game" button to multiplayer splash screen and enhance UI actions
updates.content:
Add "Join Game" button to multiplayer splash screen and enhance UI actions

Commit: abd929e

- Added new "Join Game" button with updated localization for `en-US` and `es-ES`.

updates.title: Add difficulty support for multiplayer sessions and update UI
updates.content:
Add difficulty support for multiplayer sessions and update UI

Commit: 59974f8

- Integrated `gameDifficulty` attribute into multiplayer session handling for session creation, joining, and updates.

updates.title: Add undo and deselect badge tooltips with styling
updates.content:
Add undo and deselect badge tooltips with styling

Commit: dd38fbf

- Introduced tooltips for undo and deselect badges (`undoBadgeTooltip`, `deselectAll`) with localization support.

updates.title: Enhance dice UI styles and interactions
updates.content:
Enhance dice UI styles and interactions

Commit: 7acc14e

- Added new visual cues for higher-face dice in the 2D row (`d8`, `d10`, `d12`) with unique tints and box shadows.

updates.title: Add feedback form link and update documentation references
updates.content:
Add feedback form link and update documentation references

Commit: e55f6e2

- Added feedback form link to `README.md` for quick user access.

updates.title: Add contributor invite documentation for onboarding details
updates.content:
Add contributor invite documentation for onboarding details

Commit: f3a6411

- Created `WIKI-CONTRIBUTOR-INVITE.md` for outlining project overview, gameplay mechanics, and key code entry points.

updates.title: Update modal behavior and session expiry styling
updates.content:
Update modal behavior and session expiry styling

Commit: 03570fd

- Refactored modal stack handling by introducing `preserveOpenIds` for selective modal preservation during transitions.

updates.title: Add feedback link and configuration
updates.content:
Add feedback link and configuration

Commit: 66352fe

- Added "Feedback" button to the splash screen with localization support (`splash.button.feedback`).

updates.title: Simplify Firebase deployment workflow by replacing `needs` references with reusable steps and direct outputs
updates.content:
Simplify Firebase deployment workflow by replacing `needs` references with reusable steps and direct outputs

Commit: 61abdb1

- Added reusable anchor for `Resolve Deployment Target` to streamline workflow.

updates.title: Fix typo in Firebase deployment workflow job references
updates.content:
Fix typo in Firebase deployment workflow job references

Commit: 69f9fd5

- Renamed `resolve-target` to `resolve_target` across `.github/workflows/firebase-deploy.yml`.

updates.title: Refactor Firebase deployment workflows for modularity and selective deployment
updates.content:
Refactor Firebase deployment workflows for modularity and selective deployment

Commit: bdcb2f7

- Added workflow inputs for API, web, and CDN asset deployments.

updates.title: Refresh participant liveness on `/auth/refresh` and add periodic heartbeat pings during queue lifecycle tests
updates.content:
Refresh participant liveness on `/auth/refresh` and add periodic heartbeat pings during queue lifecycle tests

Commit: fc9ad10

- Updated `/auth/refresh` to update participant liveness and session activity to prevent stale-heartbeat pruning.

updates.title: Refine splash actions and add language selector
updates.content:
Refine splash actions and add language selector

Commit: 890be5d

- Removed splash screen "Replay Tutorial" button; tutorial replay is now accessible from the "How to Play" modal.

updates.title: Update queue lifecycle timeout for CI stability and deployment mitigation
updates.content:
Update queue lifecycle timeout for CI stability and deployment mitigation

Commit: bb73068

- Increased default `queueLifecycleWaitMs` to align with production auto-start delay (60s).

updates.title: Centralize branding configuration and integrate runtime brand metadata application
updates.content:
Centralize branding configuration and integrate runtime brand metadata application

Commit: 4f1d3ae

- Introduced `gameBrand` configuration with typed branding fields (`productName`, `ogTitle`, `ogDescription`, etc.).

updates.title: Centralize branding configuration and integrate runtime brand metadata application
updates.content:
Centralize branding configuration and integrate runtime brand metadata application

Commit: ba6a5ad

- Introduced `gameBrand` configuration with typed branding fields (`productName`, `ogTitle`, `ogDescription`, etc.).

updates.title: Add post-game lifecycle and next-game queuing logic
updates.content:
Add post-game lifecycle and next-game queuing logic

Commit: 9beabb4

- Implemented lifecycle management for post-game sessions with inactivity handling and countdowns.

updates.title: Add multiplayer room chat and whisper functionality
updates.content:
Add multiplayer room chat and whisper functionality

Commit: 3224403

- Introduced support for public room chat and direct whispers (`room_channel`).

updates.title: Add support for turn actions and session state updates with dice selection logic
updates.content:
Add support for turn actions and session state updates with dice selection logic

Commit: 38acc7d

- Introduced `select` turn action for granular dice selection.

updates.title: Add `canManualNewGame` checks to restrict manual game starts during multiplayer sessions
updates.content:
Add `canManualNewGame` checks to restrict manual game starts during multiplayer sessions

Commit: 178e337

- Introduced `canManualNewGame()` method to ensure manual game starts are disabled in multiplayer mode or active session states.

updates.title: Add server-synced game start time and clock offset logic
updates.content:
Add server-synced game start time and clock offset logic

Commit: 8c75625

- Introduced `gameStartedAt` and `serverNow` fields to synchronize game start and server timestamps.

updates.title: Add multiplayer invite autostart and stale participant pruning
updates.content:
Add multiplayer invite autostart and stale participant pruning

Commit: a45c19d

- Added `maybeAutoStartFromMultiplayerInvite` for initiating sessions directly from invite links.

updates.title: Add support for queuing participants for the next game
updates.content:
Add support for queuing participants for the next game

Commit: 9acfb0c

- Introduced `queuedForNextGame` attribute to manage participants waiting for the next game.

updates.title: Add retry mechanisms for profile and avatar texture fetching
updates.content:
Add retry mechanisms for profile and avatar texture fetching

Commit: 1b4e000

- Introduced retry logic with cooldowns for user profile (`ACCOUNT_PROFILE_RETRY_COOLDOWN_MS`) and avatar textures (`AVATAR_TEXTURE_RETRY_BASE_MS` and `AVATAR_TEXTURE_RETRY_MAX_MS`) to handle intermittent failures.

updates.title: Improve RNG seeding strategy and enhance dice rotation logic
updates.content:
Improve RNG seeding strategy and enhance dice rotation logic

Commit: f6e7245

- Updated `RNG` to derive independent 32-bit states using salted seed variants for better entropy.

updates.title: Integrate new features and fixes for leaderboard, proxy, and UI
updates.content:
Integrate new features and fixes for leaderboard, proxy, and UI

Commit: 0875032

- Updated leaderboard logic to handle anonymous users and initialize user profiles securely.

updates.title: Integrate new features and fixes for leaderboard, proxy, and UI
updates.content:
Integrate new features and fixes for leaderboard, proxy, and UI

Commit: e75cfcf

- Updated leaderboard logic to handle anonymous users and initialize user profiles securely.

updates.title: Update global leaderboard fetch logic and improve API payload handling
updates.content:
Update global leaderboard fetch logic and improve API payload handling

Commit: 730d6b0

- Added support for legacy array-based responses in `getGlobalLeaderboard`.

updates.title: Update bot avatar selection and improve randomness logic
updates.content:
Update bot avatar selection and improve randomness logic

Commit: 094c065

- Adjusted bot avatar rotation to ensure unique assignment using retries (`BOT_MEME_UNIQUE_ATTEMPTS`).

updates.title: Make `/api/players/:playerId/scores` endpoint public
updates.content:
Make `/api/players/:playerId/scores` endpoint public

Commit: 03a1316

- Removed auth requirement for score history reads to ensure leaderboard and personal history views remain accessible for guests and clients with stale session tokens.

updates.title: Add image proxy support for bot meme avatars and backend fetch handling
updates.content:
Add image proxy support for bot meme avatars and backend fetch handling

Commit: 87614b3

- Implemented `/api/media/image-proxy` endpoint for secure image fetching and CORS mitigation.

updates.title: Add multi-provider support for bot meme avatars and improve API key handling
updates.content:
Add multi-provider support for bot meme avatars and improve API key handling

Commit: 9fe47e9

- Added support for multiple meme API providers (`humorapi` and `apileague`) with failover capabilities.

updates.content:
Update rules and documentation for camera assist and focus cycling

- Adjusted keyboard focus navigation instructions to include +/- keys alongside arrow keys.

updates.content:
Add camera assist feature and improve keyboard focus navigation

- Introduced camera assist toggle for Easy mode with automated camera movements after scoring.
